content:
You're welcome! I hope you have a successful sale on eBay and Facebook Marketplace. Remember to be patient, respond promptly to inquiries, and provide excellent customer service to build trust with potential buyers. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.

Also, don't forget to take clear and well-lit photos of your Sony RX100 Mark IV from multiple angles, and include detailed descriptions of its condition, accessories, and any flaws. This will help attract more buyers and reduce the likelihood of disputes.

Good luck with your sale, and I hope you're able to find a new home for your camera!
